com.mobius.vdrapi
Class PageListData

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.PageListData
public class PageListData
extends Object

Header information about each page. The data within the class is composed of data that can be shared with callers of the VDR API. The contents are a page number and section name.

Constructor Summary
PageListData(long given_relativePage, String given_sectionName)
          Use this constructor when the relative page and section name are currently available.

          retrieve the page number
